title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19 - DEPARTMENT OF STATE
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19 - DEPARTMENT OF STATE
State Regulations

Chapter I - [Repealed] (Part 1 to 66)

Chapter II - Public Access To Records (Part 80 to 102)

Chapter III - Administration (Subchapter A to E)

Chapter IV - Division Of Corporations And State Records (Part 145 to 156)

Chapter V - Division Of Corporations And State Records (Subchapter A to L)

Chapter VI - Division of Cemeteries (Part 200 to 204)

Chapter VII - State Athletic Commission (Part 205 to 219)

Chapter VIII - Division Of Consumer Protection (Part 220 to 250)

Chapter IX - SUBMISSION OF NOTICES AND FILINGS IN RELATION TO AGENCY RULE MAKING ACTION (Part 260 to 307)

Chapter X - Division For Servicemen's Voting (Subchapter A to B)

Chapter XI - Hearings (Part 400)

Chapter XII - Office Of Fire Prevention And Control (Part 425 to 536)

Chapter XIII - Waterfront Revitalization Of Coastal Areas And Inland Waterways (Part 600 to 603)

Chapter XIV - Division Of Economic Opportunity (Part 700 to 701)

Chapter XV - Local Government Services (Part 800 to 816)

Chapter XVI - Wild Animals (Part 820)

Chapter XVIII - Office of Renewable Energy Siting (Part 900 to 905)

Chapter XIX - Reserved (Part 910 to 912)

Chapter XX - Commission on ethics and lobbying in Government (Part 930 to 943)

Chapter XXX - Repealed

Chapter XXXI - Board of Real Estate Appraisal (Part 1101 to 1108)

Chapter XXXII - Division of Code Enforcement and Administration (Part 1201 to 1210)

Chapter XXXIII - State Fire Prevention and Building Code Council (Subchapter A to C)

Appendices (Appendix 1 to 7)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19

Notice

Effective October 3, 2011, Part A of Chapter 62 of the Laws of
2011 consolidated the New York State Insurance and Banking Departments into a
new Department of Financial Services. Pursuant to ยง 103 of Part A of

Chapter 62 of the Laws of 2011, whenever the Insurance Department, Banking

Department, Superintendent of Insurance, and Superintendent of Banks are
referred to or designated in any regulation pertaining to the functions, powers, obligations or duties transferred and assigned pursuant to Part A of

Chapter 62, the reference or designation will be deemed to refer to the

Department of Financial Services and the Superintendent of Financial Services, respectively. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. Chapter I - [Repealed] (Part 1 to 66)

Chapter II - Public Access To Records (Part 80 to 102)

Chapter III - Administration (Subchapter A to E)

Chapter IV - Division Of Corporations And State Records (Part 145 to 156)

Chapter V - Division Of Corporations And State Records (Subchapter A to L)

Chapter VI - Division of Cemeteries (Part 200 to 204)

Chapter VII - State Athletic Commission (Part 205 to 219)

Chapter VIII - Division Of Consumer Protection (Part 220 to 250)

Chapter IX - SUBMISSION OF NOTICES AND FILINGS IN RELATION TO AGENCY RULE MAKING ACTION (Part 260 to 307)

Chapter X - Division For Servicemen's Voting (Subchapter A to B)

Chapter XI - Hearings (Part 400)

Chapter XII - Office Of Fire Prevention And Control (Part 425 to 536)

Chapter XIV - Division Of Economic Opportunity (Part 700 to 701)

Chapter XV - Local Government Services (Part 800 to 816)

Chapter XVI - Wild Animals (Part 820)

Chapter XVIII - Office of Renewable Energy Siting (Part 900 to 905)

Chapter XIX - Reserved (Part 910 to 912)

Chapter XX - Commission on ethics and lobbying in Government (Part 930 to 943)

Chapter XXX - Repealed

Chapter XXXI - Board of Real Estate Appraisal (Part 1101 to 1108)

Chapter XXXII - Division of Code Enforcement and Administration (Part 1201 to 1210)

Chapter XXXIII - State Fire Prevention and Building Code Council (Subchapter A to C)

Appendices (Appendix 1 to 7)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19

Notice

Effective October 3, 2011, Part A of Chapter 62 of the Laws of 2011 consolidated the New York State Insurance and Banking Departments into a new Department of Financial Services. Pursuant to ยง 103 of Part A of Chapter 62 of the Laws of 2011, whenever the Insurance Department, Banking Department, Superintendent of Insurance, and Superintendent of Banks are referred to or designated in any regulation pertaining to the functions, powers, obligations or duties transferred and assigned pursuant to Part A of Chapter 62, the reference or designation will be deemed to refer to the Department of Financial Services and the Superintendent of Financial Services, respectively.
